title: SpaceX acquires xAI in bid to develop orbital data centers
description:
SpaceX has acquired xAI, an artificial intelligence company also run by Elon Musk, as part of his effort to develop orbital data centers.

The post SpaceX acquires xAI in bid to develop orbital data centers appeared first on SpaceNews.
